sub_topic: Probability of a certain event occurring in a given time period
message_1: A train arrives at a station at an average rate of 15 minutes. What is the probability that the train will arrive in the next 4 minutes?
message_2:
Assuming the train arrivals follow a uniform distribution, the probability of the train arriving in the next 4 minutes can be calculated as follows:

Probability = (Time interval of interest) / (Total time interval)
Probability = 4 minutes / 15 minutes
